descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#dd2423][u][b]I am no longer working on this, feel free to use as you wish[/b][/u][/color]

========================EmberSteel Dragon Hammer========================

[youtube]5bC-b2Ub4A0[/youtube]

==============================Description===============================

Adds A Craftable WarHammer Named EmberSteel Dragon Hammer to The Game

If you Find any Bugs, Please Let Me Know

Also Please Endorse if you Like it :)

==============================Installation==============================

Use NMM

or

Extract to Data Folder and Activate DragonHammer.esp

==============================Uninstallation============================

Use NMM

or

Delete Files in Data Folder

Data\textures\DragonHammer\DragonHammer.dds

Data\textures\DragonHammer\DragonHammer_em.dds

Data\textures\DragonHammer\DragonHammer_g.dds

Data\textures\DragonHammer\DragonHammer_n.dds

Data\textures\DragonHammer\shinydull_e.dds

Data\meshes\DragonHammer\1stpersonDragonHammer.nif

Data\meshes\DragonHammer\DragonHammer.nif

Data\DragonHammer.esp

===========================Recommended Mods======================

Deadly Dragons
Deadly Combat
Enhanced Skyrim Shaders

[color=#dd2423][u][b]I am no longer working on this, feel free to use as you wish[/b][/u][/color][/center]
